creator: Jagmeet Singh
title: (No AI) India’s AI boom pushes firms to trade near-term revenue for users
dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
content: ChatGPT and rivals are testing whether India's massive AI user boom can translate into paying customers as free offers wind down.
contentSnippet: ChatGPT and rivals are testing whether India's massive AI user boom can translate into paying customers as free offers wind down.

title: (No AI) OpenAI defeats xAI’s trade secrets lawsuit
author: Hayden Field
content:
![Elon Musk and Sam Altman overlayed in a collage.](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/chorus/uploads/chorus_asset/file/25739950/247386_Elon_Musk_Open_AI_CVirginia.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

OpenAI won a victory Tuesday in one of its legal battles with xAI, which involved allegations of poaching and theft of trade secrets.

The former company's motion to dismiss the lawsuit was [granted](https://storage.courtlistener.com/recap/gov.uscourts.cand.456862/gov.uscourts.cand.456862.73.0_4.pdf) on Tuesday with leave to amend, meaning xAI has the option to refile with modified claims. In the ruling, US District Judge Rita F. Lin wrote that "xAI does not point to any misconduct by OpenAI" in its current claims. "Instead, it points to eight former xAI employees who left for OpenAI at around the same time," with no indication that OpenAI directed their actions while leaving xAI.

xAI alleges that two former employees "stole its source code …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/ai-artificial-intelligence/884049/openai-elon-musk-xai-trade-secrets-lawsuit)

The former company's motion to dismiss the lawsuit was granted on Tuesday with leave to amend, meaning xAI has the option to refile with modified claims. In the ruling, US District Judge Rita F. Lin wrote that "xAI does not point to any misconduct by OpenAI" in its current claims. "Instead, it points to eight former xAI employees who left for OpenAI at around the same time," with no indication that OpenAI directed their actions while leaving xAI.
xAI alleges that two former employees "stole its source code  …
Read the full story at The Verge.

title: (No AI) Arvind KC appointed Chief People Officer
content: OpenAI appoints Arvind KC as Chief People Officer to help scale the company, strengthen its culture, and lead how work evolves in the age of AI.
contentSnippet: OpenAI appoints Arvind KC as Chief People Officer to help scale the company, strengthen its culture, and lead how work evolves in the age of AI.

title: (No AI) Why we no longer evaluate SWE-bench Verified
content: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.
contentSnippet: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

title: (No AI) Gemini 3.1 Pro: A smarter model for your most complex tasks
content: 3.1 Pro is designed for tasks where a simple answer isn’t enough.
contentSnippet: 3.1 Pro is designed for tasks where a simple answer isn’t enough.

title: (No AI) A new way to express yourself: Gemini can now create music
content: The Gemini app now features our most advanced music generation model Lyria 3, empowering anyone to make 30-second tracks using text or images.
contentSnippet: The Gemini app now features our most advanced music generation model Lyria 3, empowering anyone to make 30-second tracks using text or images.

creator: Dulcie Godfrey
title: (No AI) Talk to Your Own Personal Isaac Newton With Ailias’s Hologram Avatars

creator: Michael Pollan
title: (No AI) AI Will Never Be Conscious
dc:creator: Michael Pollan
content: In his new book, A World Appears, Michael Pollan argues that artificial intelligence can do many things—it just can’t be a person.
contentSnippet: In his new book, A World Appears, Michael Pollan argues that artificial intelligence can do many things—it just can’t be a person.
